Gower is looking good today with 4ft @9s WSW swell and fresh 14 mph SW winds. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your top picks, both offering fun conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell jumps to 13ft @11s WSW with strong 28 mph WSW winds, making it poor across the board. By the day after, conditions improve with 6ft @12s WSW swell and light 10 mph ESE winds, perfect for a surf session at spots like Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach. Best: day after.
